title: Greataxe
content:
Greataxe Common 1~12 Damage 1d12 Slashing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The rectangular engravings on this axe's wooden handle have been nearly scratched away by armoured hands. Greataxe Two-Handed 3 110

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The rectangular engravings on this axe's wooden handle have been nearly scratched away by armoured hands.

Greataxe Two-Handed
